Question: Argument 1
Description:
Maria drives a car. She must be wealthy. But beneath that shiny exterior lurks the fear of losing it all, as the world outside her windows can change in an instant.

Claim: Maria must be wealthy.

Which logical fallacy (if any) do you identify in the argument?
How convincing do you find this argument?
